## Workflow for reduction of speckle interferometric binary stars

### Shortest way
To obtain positional paramaters and magnitude difference between components of binary star just type

```{r eval = FALSE}
speckle_binary()
```

### Long way
```{r eval = FALSE}
mid_dark <- middle_frame()
```
